problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following renewable energy sources is potentially depletable:<< () hydroelectric () solar (x) corn ethanol () wind
[explanation] Biofuels such as corn ethanol and wood are potentially depletable because if managed improperly, they may not grow at a rate that replaces the amount harvested. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following renewable energy sources is potentially depletable:

choicegroup.label: Which of the following renewable energy sources is potentially depletable:

div.p: Biofuels such as corn ethanol and wood are potentially depletable because if managed improperly, they may not grow at a rate that replaces the amount harvested.
